name: politico
text:
The Pentagon’s top military leaders are under quarantine. The president's case of #Covid is prompting concern that the U.S. is vulnerable to adversaries.

And the election is stoking fears of more unrest in America's cities https://t.co/s6a26jHVO3

name: politico
text:
Mike Pence has the toughest job in politics tonight: defending Donald Trump's pandemic response
https://t.co/22SEkvp4MU

name: politico
text: President Trump teased a complete withdrawal of U.S troops from Afghanistan by Christmas, an aggressive timeline to fulfill a campaign promise to end what he's called America’s “endless wars” that comes as he trails in polls a month before the election https://t.co/uJ6ZuB6PId

name: politico
text:
Mike Pence has a clear task tonight: Clean up everything his boss said during last week's debate.

And Kamala Harris' goal will be to tie Pence to the administration's failure to contain the virus.
Join our #VPDebate live chat for more hot takes tonight: 
https://t.co/kHCGIqQeIO

name: politico
text: An explosive rise of Covid-19 cases in Wisconsin is worsening, overwhelming health services and especially hitting hard the northeastern region, putting in peril Donald Trump’s ability to win this key battleground state https://t.co/QBcWQIPIDO

name: politico
text: The University of Utah is hosting the first and only debate between Vice President Mike Pence and Sen. Kamala Harris https://t.co/axtpaFaPcZ
